page.title: 13Housing and Moving House.
page.content: Modern housing in Hartwell consists of bungalows,semi-detached,cottages,straw thatched,convertions & farm-housing.We moved here for instance because we liked the look of the village because it was in the country and quite small. We thought we would get to know people alot quicker.When we did move here it took alot of getting used to because we've usually lived in the, city.People sometimes move out of the village since they find there is little for them to do.I think the village is sometimes only suitable for old people because its quiet and some young people like the village because they sometimes do like the countryside.Most of the houses have quite large gardens especially those in Ashton which is quite unusual for modern houses. Hannah Love,11 & Gail Watson,11.
